gAH || 
apA#maq sOma#maqmRutA# aBUqmA&da#rSmaq jyOtiqravi#dAma dEqvAn | 
kimaqsmAn kRu#NavaqdarA#tiqH kimu# dhUqrtira#mRutaq martya#sya ||
yanma# AqtmanO# miqndA&BU#daqgnistat punaqrA&hA$rjAqtavE#dAq vica#r.ShaNiH || 
puna#raqgniScakShu#radAqt-punaqrindrOq bRuhaqspati#H | 
puna#rmE aSvinA yuqvaM cakShuqrA dha#ttamaqkShyOH || 
iqShTaya#juShastE dEva sOma stuqtastO#masya - [  ]   19
